The virtual joining details will be published here on the days of the conference. They should normally be updated between 8-9 AM UK time on each day.

Each day will have its own unique link.

**Day 1** - Thursday 23th October 2025: the recordings from today are available on the playlist [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLv5yR6DkBB8r-05BG0zcnqIxB3zmBGbYJ](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLv5yR6DkBB8r-05BG0zcnqIxB3zmBGbYJ)

**Day 2** - Friday 24th October 2025: TBC

You will need a YouTube account to be able to ask questions via the live chat.

Recordings will be available for 1 week after the conference.

<script>
// Display the current date and time when the page loads
function updateTimestamp() {
  const now = new Date();
  const options = {
    year: 'numeric',
    month: 'long',
    day: 'numeric',
    hour: '2-digit',
    minute: '2-digit',
    second: '2-digit',
    timeZoneName: 'short'
  };
  document.getElementById('update-time').textContent = now.toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options);
}

// Update timestamp when page loads
updateTimestamp();
</script>
